entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 10:56 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries or rain showers. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few flurries and rain showers beginning in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating early in the morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 10:56 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Low minus 6.
